name: Forever and Always 0.9 DEMO
description:
(This is the definitive demo of Forever and Always. The final release will be the full game.)

In the world of Other Earth, Demons, Angels, the Undead, and Crossbreeds live in fear of war against one another. Most Humans on Earth are oblivious to the idea that Angels, Demons, or anything in-between exist. Like Akira, a normal, average teen, with teen problems... and a missing mother. Akira tends to be alone, although he's sometimes seen with his childhood friend, Yoosung, A bubbly personality with a heart of gold.

Follow Akira in his journey of self-finding, literally fighting his past to have a better future.

(This is a demo. The full game is currently in development. Release date TBD. Game could be canceled or postponed at any given moment. )
